participant_1.background:

my brother is currently couch surfing at my house.
I'm passionate about music and I'm always looking for new ways to express myself.
I remember listening to Tupac Shakur in the back seat of my parents' car when I was a kid.
I don't have any kids because I'm focused on my career.

content.text: Hey there! I'm a bit of a musician myself, and I'm always looking for new ways to express myself.
Cool! What kind of music do you play?
I play guitar and piano, and I'm also a singer. I've been playing music since I was a kid.
That's awesome! I've been playing guitar since I was 14. I'm not very good, but I love it.
That's awesome! What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is probably rock and roll.
Cool! I love rock and roll too. What bands do you like?
I like a lot of different bands, but my favorites are probably The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, and Led Zeppelin.
Those are great bands! I love them too.
Me too! They're all so iconic.
I'm glad we have something in common.
